segments.text: Hey , Mike , is Jenny coming with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just asking ? But why is your face burning like mad ? Ah-huh , someone has a crush on Jenny , doesn't he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , Ted , don't be such a chicken . If you like her , you've got to tell her . Maybe she likes you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don't have the guts to ask her out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What're you so afraid of ? Just tell her what you're feeling about her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd totally die if she turned me down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But that's better than keeping everything to yourself . You've got to let her know . Come on ! You've got to take a chance ! Even though you are rejected , it's not the end of the world ! There's nothing to lose , is there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know ... Well , maybe , you're right , but how am I going to tell her ?
segments.speaker: S1
